ClassDesc: GuidanceStylist is used within a @B_android#support#v17#leanback#app#GuidedStepFragment_E@ to display contextual information for the decision(s) required at that step. Many aspects of the base GuidanceStylist can be customized through theming; see the theme attributes below. Note that these attributes are not set on individual elements in layout XML, but instead would be set in a custom theme. See If these hooks are insufficient, this class may also be subclassed. Subclasses may wish to override the @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#GuidanceStylist#onProvideLayoutId_E@ method to change the layout file used to display the guidance; more complex layouts may be supported by also providing a subclass of @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#GuidanceStylist#Guidance_E@ with extra fields. Note: If an alternate layout is provided, the following view IDs should be used to refer to base elements: @B_android#support#v17#leanback#R#id#guidance_title_E@ @B_android#support#v17#leanback#R#id#guidance_description_E@ @B_android#support#v17#leanback#R#id#guidance_breadcrumb_E@ @B_android#support#v17#leanback#R#id#guidance_icon_E@ View IDs are allowed to be missing, in which case the corresponding views will be null.
